scripts.build: npm run check-types && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --mode production
scripts.integration: percy exec -- testcafe chrome src/**/*.spec.ts --ts-config-path ./tsconfig.json --app "npm run dev"
scripts.integration:headless: percy exec -- testcafe chrome:headless src/**/*.spec.ts --ts-config-path ./tsconfig.json --app "npm run dev"
